questions.question: Calculate 15 + 23 × 2
questions.answer:
Using order of operations (BODMAS): (2 marks)
1. First multiply: 23 × 2 = 46 (1 mark)
2. Then add: 15 + 46 = 61 (1 mark)

questions.question: Calculate 3/4 + 1/8
questions.answer:
Convert to common denominator: (3 marks)
1. Find common denominator: 8 (1 mark)
2. Convert: 3/4 = 6/8 (1 mark)
3. Add: 6/8 + 1/8 = 7/8 (1 mark)

questions.question: Simplify 3x + 2x - x
questions.answer:
Collect like terms: (2 marks)
1. Group x terms: (3 + 2 - 1)x (1 mark)
2. Simplify: 4x (1 mark)

questions.question: Find the next term in the sequence: 2, 5, 8, 11, ...
questions.answer:
Identify the pattern: (2 marks)
1. Common difference: 5 - 2 = 3 (1 mark)
2. Next term: 11 + 3 = 14 (1 mark)

questions.question: Find the missing angle in a triangle where two angles are 40° and 60°
questions.answer:
Use angle sum property: (2 marks)
1. Sum of angles in triangle = 180° (1 mark)
2. Missing angle = 180° - 40° - 60° = 80° (1 mark)

questions.question: Calculate the area of a rectangle with length 8 cm and width 5 cm
questions.answer:
Apply area formula: (2 marks)
1. Area = length × width (1 mark)
2. Area = 8 × 5 = 40 cm² (1 mark)

questions.question: Simplify the ratio 12:16
questions.answer:
Find highest common factor: (2 marks)
1. HCF of 12 and 16 = 4 (1 mark)
2. Divide both by 4: 12÷4 : 16÷4 = 3:4 (1 mark)
